item.title: Vivo announces price cut for T3x 5G smartphone: Check new prices, specs - Business Standard
item.description:
Vivo announces price cut for T3x 5G smartphone: Check new prices, specs

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Business Standard

The Vivo T3x 5G smartphone has received a price reduction across all variants, making it more accessible to consumers. The smartphone, launched in April last year, offers enhanced specifications for its new lower prices.

New Prices:

  • 4GB RAM + 128GB storage: Rs 12,499 (was Rs 13,499)
  • 6GB RAM + 128GB storage: Rs 13,999 (was Rs 14,999)
  • 8GB RAM + 128GB storage: Rs 15,499 (was Rs 16,499)

Features:

  • Qualcomm Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 chipset
  • 6.72-inch FHD+ resolution display with 120Hz refresh rate
  • 6000mAh battery with 44W fast charging
  • Dual rear camera: 50MP + 2MP, 8MP front camera
“Vivo highlights the inclusion of its RAM 3.0 technology, enabling up to 8GB of virtual RAM for enhanced multitasking.”

This price cut aims to enhance the smartphone's competitiveness in the growing market.

item.title: Samsung Good Lock coming to Play Store, and more regions with One UI 7 - Business Standard
item.description:
Samsung Good Lock Coming to Play Store and Expanding Globally with One UI 7

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Samsung has announced that its Good Lock app will be available on the Google Play Store with the upcoming One UI 7 update, expanding its availability to all regions.

  • Good Lock allows deep customization of Samsung smartphones without rooting.
  • Previously limited to select regions via the Galaxy Store, it will now be accessible globally.
  • New modules include LockStar for the lock screen and Home Up for home screen customization.
  • Samsung is redesigning the Good Lock app for a more user-friendly interface.
  • One UI 7 is anticipated for release alongside the Galaxy S25 series on January 22.
“Starting with One UI 7.0 Good Lock, Good Lock can be downloaded from the Play Store as well as the Galaxy Store, and Good Lock can be used in all countries.”

In conclusion, the move to the Play Store and the redesign of Good Lock signify Samsung's commitment to enhancing user experience and accessibility worldwide.

item.title: Redmi 14C, Poco X7 Pro India price details leak ahead of launch event - India Today
item.description:
Poco X7 Pro and Redmi 14C Prices Leak Ahead of Launch

Published On: Jan 2, 2025 | Published By: Ankita Garg

The India prices of the Poco X7 Pro and Redmi 14C have leaked online ahead of their respective launch events. Here are the details.

Poco X7 Pro: India price range and specs

The Poco X7 Pro will be priced under Rs 30,000, with expectations around Rs 25,000. It features a dual-camera setup and 50MP primary camera with OIS, powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra SoC and a 6,000mAh battery with 90W fast charging.

Redmi 14C 5G Details

The Redmi 14C will launch on January 6, likely featuring a 6.88-inch HD+ display, 50MP primary camera, and powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset. The base model MRP is set at Rs 13,999, with potential early bird prices as low as Rs 10,999.

  • Poco X7 Pro expected price: under Rs 30,000
  • Design: dual-camera setup, 50MP camera with OIS
  • Specifications: MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra SoC, 6,000mAh battery, 90W fast charging
  • Redmi 14C launch date: January 6, with MRP of Rs 13,999
  • Early bird price: could be as low as Rs 10,999
"Stay tuned to India Today Tech for all the details on official pricing on launch day."

As anticipation builds for the launches, more details will become clear soon, shaping the competitive landscape in the smartphone segment.

item.title: Realme 14 Pro+ leaked specs reveal a big battery in a thin body - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
Realme 14 Pro+ leaked specs reveal a big battery in a thin body

Publication Date: January 2023

Source: GSMArena

Realme is set to launch the 14 Pro+ smartphone this month, revealing impressive specifications ahead of the release.

  • The device will feature a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 processor and Realme UI 6.0.
  • It will be the only model in the 14 series with a periscope camera.
  • The phone remains slim at 7.99 mm thick and weighs 194 g.
  • It boasts a 6.83" display with a 2800 x 1272px resolution and minimal bezels.
  • Camera setup includes a 50 MP main sensor, an 8 MP ultra-wide, and a 50 MP telephoto lens.
  • Charging supports up to 80W and carries a large 6,000 mAh battery.
"The big news for everyone is the cell's capacity – it will be 6,000 mAh, a massive 15% increase on top of the body getting thinner."

The Realme 14 Pro+ promises to deliver powerful performance and efficient battery life, launching before the end of January 2023.

item.title: iPhone 17 Series Tipped To Sport 120 Hz Displays On All Models: Here's What We Know So Far - ABP Live
item.description:
iPhone 17 Series Tipped To Sport 120 Hz Displays On All Models: Here's What We Know So Far

Publication Date: 02 Jan 2025 Source: ABP Live

The iPhone 17 series is generating excitement as rumors suggest it will come equipped with 120Hz ProMotion displays across all models, marking a significant upgrade for standard iPhones.

  • The iPhone 17, 17 Plus, and 17 Slim variants are expected to include high-refresh-rate LTPO OLED panels.
  • This feature, previously exclusive to Pro models, could potentially provide smoother visuals for all users.
  • Apple's delay in adopting high-refresh technology, prevalent in Android phones, may finally come to an end with the iPhone 17.
  • Price increases for the new models may be a possibility, but expectations remain for reasonable price points.
“The upcoming iPhone 17 series is expected to attract more users and potentially broaden the iPhone’s appeal.”

In summary, the iPhone 17 series appears set to revolutionize Apple’s standard models with features previously only seen in premium versions, reflecting the changing landscape of smartphone displays.

item.title: OnePlus 13 series India launch on 7 January: Price, Specifications, and live streaming details - India TV News
item.description:
OnePlus 13 Series India Launch on 7 January: Price, Specifications, and Live Streaming Details

Publication Date: January 7, 2025 | Source: India TV

OnePlus is poised to unveil its flagship smartphones, the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, on January 7, 2025, as part of its Winter Event in India. The event will also introduce the OnePlus Buds Pro 3. Following a successful launch in China, there is significant excitement among Indian consumers.

Key Points:

  • The expected price for the OnePlus 13 ranges between Rs 67,000 and Rs 70,000, reflecting a slight increase from its predecessor.
  • It features a 6.82-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • The OnePlus 13 is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, enhancing multitasking and gaming performance.
  • The camera system includes three 50MP sensors co-engineered with Hasselblad.
  • The smartphone is backed by a 6,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging capabilities.

How to Watch the OnePlus Winter Event Live:

The event will be streamed live on the OnePlus official website and YouTube channel on January 7.

Notable Quotes:

“With its latest flagship, OnePlus aims to strengthen its position in the premium smartphone segment.”

Overall, the upcoming launch of the OnePlus 13 series is anticipated to generate significant interest and engagement among tech enthusiasts in India.

item.title: OnePlus Watch 3 series to get big upgrades with new health tracking features - Deccan Herald
item.description:
OnePlus Watch 3 Series to Introduce Advanced Health Tracking Features

Published on: 02 January 2025, 07:48 IST

With the upcoming OnePlus global hardware event, reports suggest that OnePlus is developing upgraded versions of its smartwatch, promising enhanced health tracking functionalities.

  • Available names include OnePlus Watch 3, Watch 3 Pro, Watch X2, and X2 Pro.
  • The new smartwatches aim to integrate functionalities such as ECG monitoring and wrist temperature tracking.
  • A '60-second Checkup' feature will assess health based on various parameters including blood-oxygen saturation and sleep patterns.
  • Both models will operate on Google's WearOS.
  • Launch expected later this year rather than at the upcoming event.
"The watches will provide long-term health insights based on daily activities and sleep patterns."

In conclusion, the OnePlus Watch 3 series aims to lead in health tracking technology, although its release is still months away.

item.title: Vivo X200 Ultra Design Leaked; Tipped to Feature Snapdragon 8 Elite Chipset, 6,000mAh Battery - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Vivo X200 Ultra Design Revealed via Alleged Render; Specifications Tipped

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Gadgets 360

The Vivo X200 Ultra has surfaced with leaked renders and specifications, highlighting its impressive design and capabilities.

  • Features a 6.82-inch 2K OLED display with 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset with options for up to 24GB RAM and 2TB storage.
  • Equipped with a triple rear camera setup including a 50MP primary and a 200MP telephoto camera.
  • Comes with a robust 6,000mAh battery supporting both 90W wired and 50W wireless charging.
  • Expected to be launched in April.
“The render shows a large circular camera module on the rear.”

The Vivo X200 Ultra is anticipated to make a significant impact in the smartphone market with its advanced features and design focus.

item.title: iPhone 16, Motorola Edge 50 Neo, and more discounted during Flipkart Big Bachat Days Sale: Check offers - Hindustan Times
item.description:
The iPhone 16, Motorola Edge 50 Neo, Vivo V40e, and more have hit their all-time lowest prices on Flipkart. Here are the details.

Date: Jan 02, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

2025 is here, and with it, Flipkart has introduced the Big Bachat Days Sale, running from January 1 to 5. This sale is the ideal time to purchase mobile phones at discounted prices, including premium models like the iPhone 16 series, budget options, and more. Let us take a closer look at the top deals from Flipkart.

  • iPhone 16: Priced at ₹74,900, with potential discounts bringing it to ₹70,900.
  • Motorola Edge 50 Neo: Available for ₹20,999 with an extra savings opportunity of ₹1,000.
  • Vivo T3X 5G: Reduced to ₹12,499 from ₹17,499.
  • Motorola G85 5G: Now at ₹17,999, with additional savings possible.
  • Vivo V40E: Discounted to ₹26,999, with potential additional offers bringing it below ₹26,000.
“This is an excellent value-for-money deal for anyone looking to buy the latest iPhone 16 series.”

The Flipkart Big Bachat Days Sale offers significant discounts across various mobile models, providing consumers with attractive options to purchase at reduced prices.

item.title: Redmi Turbo 4 with MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra, 6,550mAh battery launched in China: price, specifications - 91mobiles
item.description:
Redmi Turbo 4 with MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra, 6,550mAh Battery Launched in China

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: 91mobiles

Redmi Turbo 4 is now official in China, featuring advanced specifications and a robust battery. This flagship smartphone is set to launch in other markets, including India as the POCO X7 Pro.

Key Points:

  • Launched in four variants starting at CNY 1,999 (Rs 23,488 approx).
  • Available in Shadow Black, Shallow Sea Blue, Lucky Cloud White.
  • Features a 6.67-inch TCL Huaxing 1.5K OLED display, 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset.
  • Includes a 50MP primary camera with OIS and a 20MP front camera.
  • Packs a 6,550mAh battery with 90W fast charging.
  • Runs HyperOS 2 based on Android 15.
“The smartphone is said to retain 80 percent battery health even after 1600 cycles.”

The Redmi Turbo 4 brings significant improvements over its predecessor, including a sleeker design, faster chipset, enhanced camera capabilities, and a larger battery.

item.title: Redmi 14C 5G Price in India, Chipset Details Tipped Ahead of Launch - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Redmi 14C 5G Price in India, Chipset Details Tipped Ahead of Launch

Date: January 6
Source: Gadgets 360

The Redmi 14C 5G is set to launch in India on January 6, with expected pricing and specifications leaked ahead of time.

  • The anticipated price for the smartphone is Rs. 13,999 for the 4GB + 128GB variant.
  • With potential bank offers, the price could drop to Rs. 10,999 or Rs. 11,999.
  • The device may feature a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset and a 5,160mAh battery.
  • It will support 18W charging and will have an AI-backed 50-megapixel dual rear camera.
  • Expected to have a 6.88-inch HD+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Available in three colors: Starlight Blue, Stardust Purple, and Stargaze Black.
“The Redmi 14C 5G will likely be a rebadged version of the Redmi 14R 5G.”

This launch further expands the Redmi 14 series, which now includes both 4G and 5G variants.

item.title: iPhone 17 is coming to India this year: Everything we know - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 17 is coming to India this year: Everything we know

Publication Date: 2025-01-01 Source: India Today

The upcoming iPhone 17 series is set to revolutionize the smartphone experience with several innovative features and models.

  • Four models expected, possibly replacing the Plus model with an Air variant.
  • The iPhone 17 lineup will feature 120Hz ProMotion and always-on displays.
  • Expected upgrades include a 48MP rear camera and a 6.6-inch display for the new models.
  • All models may get a 24-megapixel front-facing camera upgrade for better selfies and video calls.
  • The Pro Max model could feature three 48-megapixel rear cameras, enhancing mobile photography.
  • Adjustable aperture may be available on select models for enhanced photographic control.
  • All models powered by the latest A19 chip; Pro models to have an A19 Pro chip.
  • Apple’s own 5G modem and Wi-Fi 7 chip may debut in upcoming models.
  • A new multifunction button may replace traditional controls in the Pro models.
  • Durability enhancements are being developed in collaboration with Corning.
“Apple is reportedly working with Corning to enhance durability with scratch-resistant, anti-reflective glass for better outdoor visibility and protection.”

The iPhone 17 promises significant upgrades and features that aim to set new standards in the smartphone market.

item.title: Redmi Turbo 4 with 6.67″ 1.5K 120Hz OLED display, Dimensity 8400 Ultra, 6550mAh battery, IP66 + IP68 + IP69 ratings announced - FoneArena
item.description:
Redmi Turbo 4 with 6.67″ 1.5K 120Hz OLED display, Dimensity 8400 Ultra, 6550mAh battery, IP66 + IP68 + IP69 ratings announced

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: FoneArena

Xiaomi has announced the Redmi Turbo 4, marking a significant addition to its Turbo series. The device features advanced display and battery technology paired with new processing power.

  • 6.67-inch 120Hz LTPS OLED display with peak brightness of 3200 nits.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra SoC.
  • Up to 16GB LPDDR5X RAM and 512GB UFS 4.0 storage options.
  • Dual rear cameras including a 50MP main sensor and an 8MP ultra-wide camera.
  • Largest battery in Xiaomi phones at 6550mAh with 90W fast charging.
  • IP66 + IP68 + IP69 certifications for dust and water resistance.
  • Available in multiple colors with different pricing options.
“The phone promises 1600 times of four-year durable long cycle, ultra-long service life.”

This launch showcases Xiaomi's ongoing commitment to innovation in the smartphone industry, particularly with their focus on high-performance specs and durability.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 International Model Spotted On Geekbench, Hinting At Snapdragon 8 Elite Exclusivity - ABP Live
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 International Model Spotted On Geekbench, Hinting At Snapdragon 8 Elite Exclusivity

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Geekbench

Recent leaks about the Samsung Galaxy S25 series suggest the incorporation of Snapdragon processors for the international variant, as evidenced by its listing on Geekbench.

  • The Galaxy S25, model SM-S931B, is expected to be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, implying a possible shift towards Snapdragon chips for all regions.
  • Geekbench scores for the Galaxy S25 prototype show 2,986 single-core and 9,355 multi-core performance.
  • The Galaxy S25 lineup is anticipated to launch in January 2025, with preorders starting in South Korea on January 24.
  • The retail version is expected to offer improved performance and will run on Android 15 with 12GB of RAM.
“As the official announcement approaches, more details about the Galaxy S25 series are anticipated.”

This leak further intensifies the anticipation for Samsung's upcoming flagship devices, particularly regarding their processing power and release timeline.

item.title: GTA 6 Launch 2025: Release Date, Price In India, Gameplay, Requirements, Maps, All We Know So Far - Times Now
item.description:
GTA 6 Launch 2025: Release Date, Price In India, Gameplay, Requirements, Maps, All We Know So Far

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Grand Theft Auto VI (GTA 6) is set to launch in 2025, featuring a massive open world, two protagonists, new gameplay mechanics, and an immersive map inspired by Florida's landscapes.

  • GTA 6 is expected to launch in the second half of 2025.
  • It will be available on current-gen consoles, specifically Xbox Series X/S and PlayStation 5.
  • The game includes a new open world inspired by Florida's landscapes and features Vice City.
  • The expected price in India is Rs 5,999 for the standard edition.
  • A second trailer is expected to drop on December 27, 2024.
GTA 6 is set to redefine open-world gaming, making 2025 a year to remember for fans.

In conclusion, GTA 6 promises to be one of the biggest events in the gaming world, with high expectations for its arrival.

item.title: Top Trends For Android Flagships In 2025: Camera, Battery, Design, Price & More - Trak.in
item.description:
Top Trends For Android Flagships In 2025: Camera, Battery, Design, Price & More

Date & Source: January 2, 2025 - Trak.in

The article discusses the latest trends in Android flagship smartphones for 2025, covering advancements in battery technology, performance, design, and pricing.

  • Next-gen Android phones feature silicon batteries for improved capacity.
  • Expect a performance leap with new Snapdragon and MediaTek processors.
  • Rumors of slimmer designs may lead to reduced battery life and overheating issues.
  • Price increases anticipated due to rising component costs.
  • Enhanced fingerprint sensors and higher IP ratings for water resistance are expected.
  • Emergence of 8K video capture and AI features in smartphones.
Qualcomm claims a 44% boost in efficiency, while MediaTek reports a 40% improvement.

In conclusion, 2025 promises exciting innovations for Android flagship smartphones, with significant advancements across various technological aspects.

item.title: Researchers are developing AI system that will let humans 'talk' to animals - Firstpost
item.description:
Researchers Developing AI System to Facilitate Communication with Animals

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: Firstpost

The Earth Species Project has introduced NatureLM, an AI designed to decode animal communication, aiming to enhance human-animal interactions.

  • NatureLM can identify animal species and context, including age and emotional state.
  • The AI is capable of understanding communications from species it hasn’t directly encountered before.
  • Efforts are underway to address the biodiversity crisis, fostering a deeper connection with the natural world.
  • Research showcases that some animals, like prairie dogs, use complex languages that combine nouns and adjectives.
  • NatureLM is part of a larger trend of using AI to tackle environmental issues, such as climate change.
“Decoding animal communication could bridge the gap between humans and the natural world,” said Katie Zacarian, CEO of the Earth Species Project.

As technologies like NatureLM evolve, they may significantly change our understanding of animal behavior and rights, moving us closer to a time when we can communicate with animals more effectively.

item.title: realme 14 Pro series to launch soon: 50MP periscope camera, 120X zoom, and more confirmed - CNBCTV18
item.description:
realme 14 Pro series to launch soon: 50MP periscope camera, 120X zoom, and more confirmed

Publication Date: March 2024 Source: CNBC TV18

Smartphone maker realme is set to release its 14 Pro series later this month, showcasing impressive camera specifications.

  • Features a 50MP triple-reflection periscope camera with 120x super zoom.
  • 8MP ultrawide lens for expansive shots.
  • 32MP autofocus front camera for high-quality selfies and video calls.
  • Powered by the Mediatek Dimensity 7300 chipset.
  • Expected to run on Android 15 with 8GB of RAM.
  • The realme 14 Pro+ is rumored to have a 6.83-inch 1.5K AMOLED display and a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • The pricing for the new series is expected to be similar to the previous realme 13 Pro series.
“The camera system includes a triple-flash setup for enhanced low-light photography.”

The realme 14 Pro series aims to bring enhanced photography capabilities and robust performance in a competitive smartphone market.

item.title: Apple's Upcoming iPhone SE 4 Will Reportedly Be Called the iPhone 16E - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Apple's Upcoming Affordable iPhone May Not Carry the SE Moniker

Publication Date: January 1, 2025
Source: Gadgets 360

Apple's next affordable iPhone, anticipated in the first quarter, may break tradition by not being called the SE. This shift could align it more with the iPhone 16 lineup.

  • The iPhone SE 4 is expected to be named iPhone 16E.
  • It may feature the A18 chipset and Apple Intelligence capabilities.
  • The design is rumored to be similar to the iPhone 14.
  • Expected specifications include a 6.06-inch LTPS OLED display and a 48-megapixel rear camera.
  • Pricing is projected to be under $500.
“Based on what my source has reported, it seems that the new iPhone that Apple will unveil in 2025 will not be called iPhone SE4, but iPhone 16E.” — Majin Bu

This change indicates Apple's strategy to differentiate its affordable model while remaining competitive in the market.
